title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB 
and 31AD) (Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (sections 31ab 31ad) (covid-19) (operation certain indoor premises) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: 2. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Sections 31AB and 31AD) 
(Covid-19) (Operation of certain indoor premises) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
385 of 2021) is amended, in paragraph (2), by the substitution of “30th day of 
January 2022” for “9th day of January 2022”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 January, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [8] 3

title: the Health (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2021 (No. 24 of 2021)) of the Health Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend S.I. 385 of 2021 (Operation of certain indoor 
premises) to extend the date of operation to 30th January 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [8]
